mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCH_DEL_STATUS='N' AND (EMP_ID IS NULL or EMP_ID=#{empId})
SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCH_DEL_STATUS='N' AND EMP_ID IS NULL

SELECT * FROM (select * from schedule S,(SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (LEVEL -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') week FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) where ((sysdate >= sch_str_date and sysdate <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+1 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+1 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+2 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+2 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+3 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+3 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+4 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+4 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+5 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+5 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+6 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+6 <= sch_end_date) or (sysdate+7 >= sch_str_date and sysdate+7 <= sch_end_date)) AND SCH_DEL_STATUS='N' AND (EMP_ID='tw101') ORDER BY week) WHERE WEEK >= SCH_STR_DATE and week <= sch_end_date
SELECT weeks FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (LEVEL -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') weeks FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 )
